2020230.name: BioCrisis : Return 2 the Lab Demo
2020230.description:
The Alert Has Been Given.
The Virus Is On the Loose.
You've Escaped the Lab.
The City Will Be Nuked.




BioCrisis : Return 2 the lab takes place just after the events of BioCrisis.
The game is a rail shooter where you can use a mouse or a light gun to aim and shoot at zombies.
Throughout 5 chapters and 3 secret chapters, you will face numerous situations and abominable creatures escaped from the lab.




BioCrisis : Return 2 the lab offers features:
● Rail-Shooter Experience
● Techno music By Mathusalemherod
● 8 chapters
● 3 difficulty level
● Combo meter
● Leaderboard
● Zombies
2020230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
